data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Todd, Jonathan A., Rawlings, Timothy A. (2014): A review of the Polystira clade—the Neotropic’s largest marine gastropod radiation (Neogastropoda: Conoidea: Turridae sensu stricto). Zootaxa 3884 (5): 445-491, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.5.5
